Here's the conversion table for Java/SQL:

| Java             | SQL                     |
|------------------|-------------------------|
| LocalDate        | DATE                    |
| LocalTime        | TIME                    |
| LocalDateTime    | TIMESTAMP               |
| OffsetTime       | TIME_WITH_TIMEZONE      |
| OffsetDateTime   | TIMESTAMP_WITH_TIMEZONE |
| Duration         | BIGINT                  |
| Instant          | TIMESTAMP               |
| ZonedDateTime    | TIMESTAMP               |
